Aerodial

Compact Javascript library for fine-tuning parameters and monitoring value changes.

{% endblock %} {% block content %}

Features

  • Easy to use, user-friendly document
  • Clean and simple interface
  • Mobile support

Getting started

1. Add Aerodial to your project

First, download the latest Aerodial and import it to your web page.

<script src="path/to/aerodial-{{version}}.min.js"></script>
.html

TODO: CDN

Please help this project by starring the repository if you use and like it. Thanks!

Star

2. Create a aero

Create an instance of Aerodial by new Aerodial().

var aero = new Aerodial();
.js

3. Ready to go!

You can add various components to aero. Inputs for fine-tuning parameters, Monitors to checking values, and more!
